title: Avg. Joe type
content:
Hey guys,

With a new job comes new graphics, however, there is one font that they would like to keep and I don't have access to the old PSD.

Anyone have any thoughts?

Thanks kindly!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Average Joe](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819153555/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_2.gif) | 8.89 KB |
author: feldhouse

comments.content:
I think it's a tweaked version of [VAG Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819153555/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/vag+rounded/fonts/)

Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819153555/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)

As I said, a tweaked version of VAG Rounded ;)

greetings Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819153555/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)
Thank you so much, guys! Great help indeed.
